scripts.dco:setup_network: docker network ls |grep "oodikone_default" || docker network create oodikone_default
scripts.start: npm run dco:setup_network && npm run dco:up -- --scale importer-mankeli=3 && npm run dco:logs
scripts.start:db: npm run dco:setup_network && npm run dco:up:db && npm run dco:logs
scripts.build: npm i && npm i --prefix ./importer-api && npm i --prefix ./importer-mankeli && npm run dco -- build
scripts.lintfix: npm run lintfix --prefix ./importer-api && npm run lintfix --prefix ./importer-mankeli
scripts.reset: docker volume rm sis-importer_sis-importer-datastore && docker volume rm sis-importer_sis-importer-pgdata && docker volume rm sis-importer_sis-importer-redis
scripts.restart: npm run dco:down && npm run reset && npm start
